org.codehaus.mojo.nbm.model

Class NetBeansModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.mojo.nbm.model.NetBeansModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class NetBeansModule
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Describes the layout, dependencies and packaging of a NetBeans module.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getAuthor

        public String getAuthor()
        Get dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Author of the module. Is used when generating the NBM file.
        Returns:
        String

      • getCluster

        public String getCluster()
        Get dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Each modules should belong to a cluster. A cluster is a group of related modules. For individual modules it's not that important. Refer to netbeans.org documentation for more details.
        Returns:
        String

      • getCodeNameBase

        public String getCodeNameBase()
        Get dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Codenamebase of the module. Primary identification of the module. Usually the package name. Eg. "org.codehaus.mevenide.project". If not defined here, the default value is constructed from groupId and artifactId.
        Returns:
        String

      • getDependencies

        public List<Dependency> getDependencies()
        Method getDependencies.
        Returns:
        List

      • getDistributionUrl

        public String getDistributionUrl()
        Get dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Http URL of the location where the module can be downloaded from the internet. This value put into the NBM and used when generating the Autoupdate Site. Should point directly to the NBM download.
        Returns:
        String

      • getHomepageUrl

        public String getHomepageUrl()
        Get dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Homepage URL of the module. Is accessible from NetBeans UI upon installation, should point to place with additional information about the functionality. If not defined, it defaults to POM's url element.
        Returns:
        String

      • getLibraries

        public List<String> getLibraries()
        Method getLibraries.
        Returns:
        List

      • getLicenseFile

        public String getLicenseFile()
        Get dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Path to the license agreement file.
        Returns:
        String

      • getLicenseName

        public String getLicenseName()
        Get dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Name of the license. If the user already agreed to the same license before, he/she won't be asked again to agree.
        Returns:
        String

      • getManifest

        public String getManifest()
        Get dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Location of the manifest file with NetBeans specific manifest entries.
        Returns:
        String

      • getModelEncoding

        public String getModelEncoding()
        Get the modelEncoding field.
        Returns:
        String

      • getModuleType

        public String getModuleType()
        Get

        DEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Type of the module. Possible values are

        autoload - Such a module is automatically enabled when some other module requires it and automatically disabled otherwise.

        eager - This module type gets automatically enabled when all it's dependencies are satisfied. Disabled otherwise.

        normal - This is the default value. This kind of module is enabled/disabled manually by the user. It installs enabled.

        Returns:
        String

      • getNbmResources

        public List<NbmResource> getNbmResources()
        Method getNbmResources.
        Returns:
        List

      • isRequiresRestart

        public boolean isRequiresRestart()
        Get dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Determines if the module requires restart of the IDE/platform upon installation.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • setCodeNameBase

        public void setCodeNameBase(String codeNameBase)
        Set dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Codenamebase of the module. Primary identification of the module. Usually the package name. Eg. "org.codehaus.mevenide.project". If not defined here, the default value is constructed from groupId and artifactId.
        Parameters:
        codeNameBase -

      • setDependencies

        public void setDependencies(List<Dependency> dependencies)
        Set dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. List of module dependencies. The plugin will use it to Generate the OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies manifest entry.
        Parameters:
        dependencies -

      • setDistributionUrl

        public void setDistributionUrl(String distributionUrl)
        Set dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Http URL of the location where the module can be downloaded from the internet. This value put into the NBM and used when generating the Autoupdate Site. Should point directly to the NBM download.
        Parameters:
        distributionUrl -

      • setHomepageUrl

        public void setHomepageUrl(String homepageUrl)
        Set dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Homepage URL of the module. Is accessible from NetBeans UI upon installation, should point to place with additional information about the functionality. If not defined, it defaults to POM's url element.
        Parameters:
        homepageUrl -

      • setLibraries

        public void setLibraries(List<String> libraries)
        Set groupId:artifactId of artifacts that shall become part of the module and be added on the classpath (ClassPath: manifest entry gets created and the jar is included in the nbm file).
        Parameters:
        libraries -

      • setModuleType

        public void setModuleType(String moduleType)
        Set

        DEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. Type of the module. Possible values are

        autoload - Such a module is automatically enabled when some other module requires it and automatically disabled otherwise.

        eager - This module type gets automatically enabled when all it's dependencies are satisfied. Disabled otherwise.

        normal - This is the default value. This kind of module is enabled/disabled manually by the user. It installs enabled.

        Parameters:
        moduleType -

      • setNbmResources

        public void setNbmResources(List<NbmResource> nbmResources)
        Set dEPRECATED, use the plugin configuration instead. List of resources that shall be also included into the Nbm file along with the module jar and library jars.
        Parameters:
        nbmResources -
